ğ—¬ğ˜‚ğ—½ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—± currently offers Campaign and Time Attack mode. The plot takes you to a space station near Jupiter, where a brave Kosmonaut has to repair many broken devices.

To move around, the hero uses special grappling hooks, thanks to which he can get to places inaccessible to ordinary people.

ğ—¬ğ˜‚ğ—½ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—± is a dynamic platformer with a lot of puzzles, traps and wacky humour, sunk in futuristic dieselpunk sauce.
